Sure! If you're looking for a retreat that specifically focuses on mental health and relaxation, here are a few options:

1. Kripalu Center for Yoga & Health (Massachusetts): This retreat offers programs that focus on stress reduction, self-discovery, and emotional healing, with options for meditation, yoga, and mindful movement.

2. The Art of Living Retreat Center (North Carolina): Programs at this retreat center focus on stress management, meditation, yoga, and Ayurveda, with an emphasis on relaxation and spiritual growth.

3. Shambhala Mountain Center (Colorado): This retreat offers mindfulness and meditation programs, as well as workshops on emotional resilience and mental clarity.

4. The Lodge at Woodloch (Pennsylvania): The focus of programs here is on stress relief and mental clarity, with options for spa treatments, meditation, yoga, and fitness.

5. Sedona Mago Retreat (Arizona): Programs here focus on tapping into your inner wisdom and cultivating relaxation through meditation, tai chi, and yoga.

All of these wellness retreats offer different programs and activities depending on your interests, so make sure to research the specific retreat and program to find the one that is right for you.
